meanings.sent1: Scientists study radioelements to understand radiation effects.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled the radioelements with caution.
meanings.sent3: The radioelements in the lab seemed to have a glowing personality.
meanings.sent4: The radioelements whispered secrets of the universe as they decayed.
meanings.sent5: The radioelements hummed softly, filling the room with energy.

meanings.definition: elements with unstable nuclei that undergo radioactive decay
meanings.sent1: Radioelements can transform into different elements over time.
meanings.sent2: The geiger counter detected the presence of radioelements in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The radioelements in the experiment were quite the drama queens, changing identities constantly.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like radioelements, unstable yet captivating.
meanings.sent5: The radioelements danced and shimmered, a beautiful yet dangerous display.
